defaultProjects.name: Open Power Quality
defaultProjects.description: Open source hardware and software for distributed power quality data collection, analysis, and visualization.

defaultProjects.name: RadGrad
defaultProjects.description: Growing awesome computer scientists, one graduate at a time.

defaultProjects.name: WRENCH
defaultProjects.description: WRENCH is an open-source library for developing simulators for large-scale scientific computation

defaultProjects.name: Cyber Canoe
defaultProjects.description: Software for Unity projects involving stereoscopic resolution driven by 9 PCs with a GeForce 980 graphics card.

defaultVendors.description: Panda Express serves gourmet Chinese food made with only the freshest ingredients.
Da Spot Health Foods & Juices offers diverse, healthy and affordable cuisine with a unique take on tasty dishes from around the world.
Le Crêpe Café makes traditional French crêpes, cooked to order in front of customers.

defaultVendors.campusLocation: Athletic Complex, 2nd Floor & Paradise Palms Café
defaultVendors.description: Delicious local and Asian-American fusion cuisine served in big portions at reasonable prices!

Holoholo Grill features healthy, locally grown salads, sandwiches, and grab-and-go items at affordable prices. They are committed to using the freshest island-grown ingredients sourced directly from farmers and fishermen. Grab-and-go, breakfast items, or catering for any sized group are also available!
Traditional super ono ahi & tako poke; always fresh, premium ahi — never frozen! Made to order poke by the pound & poke bowls.

Dunkin’ Donuts in Paradise Palms Cafe will keep Hawaii running with high-quality beverage offerings–including freshly-brewed Hot and Iced Coffees–paired perfectly with delicious donuts, bakery good, sandwiches and more.
Mobile eatery serving Mediterranean cuisine like chicken and lamb kabob as well as with vegan options such as hummus, Israeli salad, falafel, and fresh baked pita made daily.

defaultVendors.campusLocation: Post (Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday) & Krauss Hall (Wednesday)
defaultVendors.description: Kamitoku Ramen specializes in a Tottori-style beef bone ramen.
